resources.string: All forces and moments placed correctly!
Draw the free-body diagram of the highlighted member. The member has mass m and gravity is downward

Tap and drag from appropriate locations to add forces and long press to add moments

Change direction of a moment by dragging the arrow head clockwise or counterclockwise in a circle

Blue arrows are correct. Gray arrows are incorrect and should be moved 

Press the Restart button to remove all arrows and start over

Press the "Check" button when finished
